titleStmt.title: SII 7.870: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 870. (A.R. No. 242 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumaṉṉi vaḷara Irunila maṭantaiyum poṟcayap pāvaiyuñ cirttanic celviyun taṉ perunteviyarāki yiṉpuṟa neṭutiya lūḻiyu ḷiṭaituṟaināṭun tuṭarvaṉaveli pa
ṭar vaṉavāciyuñ cuḷḷicūḻ matiṭ koḷḷippākkaiyum naṇṇaṟkarumaraṇ maṇṇaikkaṭakkamum porukaṭa līḻattaraicarta muṭiyu māṅkavar teviya roṅkeḻil muṭiyu muṉṉavarpakkal teṉṉavar vaitta cuntara muṭiyu min
tira ṉāramun teṇṭirai yīḻamaṇṭala muḻupatu meṟipaṭaik keraḷaṉ muṟaimaiyiṟ cūṭuṅ kulataṉamākiya palar pukaḻ muṭiyuñ ceṅkatir mālaiyuñ caṅkatirvelait tolperuṅ kāvaṟ palpaḻantīvuñ ceruviṟ ciṉavi yirupattoru kālaraicukaḷai kaṭṭa paracurāmaṉ mevaruñ cāṅkntimat tivara
ṇ karuti yiruttiya cempoṟ ṟiruttaku muṭiyu māpporu taṇṭāṟ koṇṭa kopparakecaripanmarāṉa śrīrājen=tiracoḻatevaṟku yāṇṭu 9Āvatu milaāṭāṉa jaṉanātavaḷanāṭṭu k=kuṟukkaikkūṟṟattut tiruk
kovalūrt tiruviraṭṭāṉamuṭaiya mahātevaṟku matdhyānattut tirumañcaṭkāppuk=ku Ittevar tevatāṉam Iccivapurattu viyāpāri kuḷattuḻāṉ toṉṟi maṇṭakavanum kāmakkiḻavan kuppai Aṭṭāḷamum U
ṭuttūruṭaiyān kūttaṉ man=taṉum Uḷḷiṭṭa nakarattārvacam viḻupparaiyanāṭṭu Akanāṭṭu Āḻiyūr Attiyuḻāṉ veṅkiṭavan
veṇkāṭaṉ kuṭutta tuḷainiṟai kācukallāṟ poṉ ṉaiṅkaḻañcu Ippon Aiyṅkaḻañcuṅ koṇṭu Ippoṉṉukkup palicaiyāka Āyira
vaṉtilākkolāl nicatam Orupala mañcaḷ muḷai can=tirātittaval Itu tevan cayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattu
śrīkoyilukke koṭuva n=tiṭuva tāṉo muṟ collappaṭṭa muvaru muḷḷiṭṭa civapurattu nakarattom Itu panmāyeśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 7.870 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
